TopicTitle: sortable & filterable contracts in Mission Control

Articles.Content:
Sorry if already suggested, but I couldn't see it.

Contracts in the Mission control are a bit annoying to sift through. It would be very nice to be able to ;

- filter them by type, so you could exclude all of a particular type ie part-test contracts, or just show 1 or 2 types ie; just show position-satellite & science data from space contract

- sort them by reward, so you could have the highest reward contracts at the top

- filter them by planet, ie just show contracts that apply to Mun.

Less important but if we can have sort/filter then why not also;

- filter by company (agent)

- sort by advance

- sort by expiry date
